segments.text: We did a survey on your job performance .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not so good . Lots of complains .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? I thought I was doing well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your performance so far is not quite in line with what we expect for our executives . I hope I â€™ Ve made my point .
